mapper.select:
select z.mc name, count(1) value from (select y.mc from DB_ZXXT.T_DT_DTBLQK t, T_DM_DTYWXL y where 1 = 1 and substr(t.swfj_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) and substr(y.dt_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) and t.dtywxl_dm = y.dtywxl_dm and t.JSSJ >
) z group by z.mc having count(1) > 0 order by count(1) desc

select r.mc name, z.value from (select t.czry_dm name, count(*) value from db_zxxt.t_dt_dtblqk t where 1 = 1 and substr(t.swfj_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) and t.JSSJ >
group by t.czry_dm) z, db_zxxt.T_DM_DTRY r where z.value > 0 and z.name = r.dtry_dm and substr(r.sws_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) order by z.value desc

select c.mc rymc, d.mc dtmc, a.ck_dm ckhm, to_char(a.dlsj, 'HH24:mm') dlsj, a.gzsc, a.xxsc, b.ywzl, b.yjhzs, b.ywpjsc, trunc(b.ywzl / a.gzsc,2) fhl from (select t.dt_dm, t.ck_dm, t.dtry_dm, t.gzsc, t.dlsj,t.xxsc from T_DT_CKSSTJ t where t.dt_dm = ${dtdm} and t.ck_dm = ${ckdm} and rownum = 1) a, (select t.dt_dm, t.ck_dm, sum(t.ywzl) ywzl, sum(t.yjhzs) yjhzs, trunc(sum(t.ywzl * t.ywpjsc) / sum(t.ywzl),2) ywpjsc from T_DT_CKSSTJ t where t.dt_dm = ${dtdm} and t.ck_dm = ${ckdm} group by t.dt_dm, t.ck_dm) b, T_DM_DTRY c, T_DM_DT d where a.dt_dm = b.dt_dm and a.ck_dm = b.ck_dm and a.dtry_dm = c.dtry_dm and a.dt_dm = d.dt_dm

select d.mc name, z.value from (select t.DTYWDL_DM name, count(*) value from db_zxxt.t_dt_dtblqk t where substr(t.swfj_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) and t.JSSJ >
group by t.DTYWDL_DM) z, T_DM_DTYWDL d where z.name = d.dtywdl_dm order by z.value desc

select * from (select d.mc, t.yblsl, t.dqddrs, t.yjddsj from T_DT_DTQHTJ t, T_DM_DTYWDL d where substr(t.dt_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) and t.dtywdl_dm = d.dtywdl_dm order by t.yblsl desc) z where rownum < 6
select count(1) value from T_DT_DTBLQK t where substr(t.swfj_dm, 0, 7) = substr(#{unitCode},0,7) and t.jssj >
